Portland.Harrison B. Brown House: The Harrison Bird Brown House is an historic house at 400 Danforth Street in West End of Portland, Maine, United States. It was built in 1861 for Harrison Bird Brown (1831-1915), one of Maine's best-known painters of the late 19th century, and was his home and studio until 1892. The house was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1980.
